content.rendered:
RSI ExtraCap Evo

ROCK SOLID STRONG

  • 409 Stainless Steel Construction 
  • Matte Black Paint 
  • Filtered Air Pressure Vent 
  • Roof Rails 
  • Rear Brake Light
  • Cab Slider Window 
  • Driver and Passenger Sliding Windows
  • Lrg Gull Wing Doors 
Compatible Vehicles

Ford Ranger 2012+ (EVO S Only)

Toyota Hilux 2016+  (EVO A Only) (A Deck Tub Only)

Modular Design

SmartCap is the world’s ﬁrst modular stainless steel truck cap system. From its 5-piece modular design, to its seamlessly integrated accessories, SmartCap lets you build and organise your truck bed exactly how you want it. But that’s just the beginning, so put on your thinking cap, and let the adventure begin…

Flush Sliding Window!

The flush-mounted sliding window on the Gullwing doors provides excellent ventilation for the enclosed truck bed. From all the way open to closed, choose from four lockable positions to achieve your desired air-flow.

Absolute Access!

The Gull-wing Door openings are around 17% taller than the average side window you’ll find on a fibreglass canopy—making it real easy to access cargo or bolt in a SmartCap Component.

Positive Pressure Filtered Vent

The Positive Pressure Air Vent filters fresh air into the cap at a greater velocity than the enclosed bed is trying to suck it back in. This keeps road dust outside of the bed rather than all over your stuff.

Universal Roof Rails

Sleekly designed into the top of the SmartCap™, our integrated Roof Rails allow you to utilise other SmartCap Components for mounting roof-top tents, bikes, kayaks, ladders—you name it. Plus, if you already own a rack system, no problem. The universal design allows you to mount just about anything.

 

 

Click here to view the entire range of RSI SmartCap Accessories available!

Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!

 

Please note: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order.
